1.title: Demographics of Marriage and Divorce
1.desc: Using R programming language and Shiny api, our team analyzed a marriage and divorce dataset and made visualization of the data to help users understand how age, wealth, location and ethnicity affects divorce and marriage.

2.title: Top 10 Spotify
2.desc: Shows and gives a preview of the Top 10 track for an Artist in a selected country

1.title: League of Legends
1.desc: League of Legends is a fast-paced, competitive online game that blends the speed and intensity of an RTS with RPG elements. Two teams of powerful champions, each with a unique design and playstyle, battle head-to-head across multiple battlefields and game modes.
